action-showrealname:
{{doc-action|showrealname}}
Right to see real names in [[Special:ListUsers]].
right-showrealname:
{{doc-right|showrealname}}
Right to see real names in [[Special:ListUsers]].
sru-realname-inline:
{{notranslate}}
HTML code used to format the user data which replaces the user name in [[Special:ListUsers]]. The parameters are replaced with the fields retrieved from the database, by default user_real_name, user_name, user_email.
sru-realname-append:
{{optional}}
HTML code used to format the user data which is appended to the user name in [[Special:ListUsers]]. The parameters are replaced with the fields retrieved from the database, by default user_real_name, user_name, user_email.
